channel.title: Can this happen?
channel.description:
i know that if u have a router and ur making a server u need 2 port forward ur ip or something, my question is:::: can u use hamachi for ur server so people can connect to your server even tho u have a router and if the answer is yes plz send me a tutorial saying how to do it, i read the pinned tutorials but i cant seem 2 understand some of them. ty
~~~Apple Pie~~~ ~~~bl@@d~~~

item.title: Can this happen?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“manillajones, post:1, topic:103337”]yes basicly hamachi is like a big network for communicating with ppl, just open hamachi and type in your ip ( make sure your server is runnin)
in the server up and user name and pass and tell your friend swhat ip your on and they can connect…

p.s. if this works, give me rep++ ive been so generous and helpful and no one has givein me rep[/quote]

Thats Because You’ve Been Asking, Do What I Do, Learn To Code A Particular Thing Eg : Mine (Minigames)
Then Make Lots Of Minigames, And Someone May Rep You

Read full topic
